title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.7 - Reportable levels of heavy metals in blood and urine
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.7 - Reportable levels of heavy metals in blood and urine

State Regulations

For purposes of section
22.6
of this Part, the following levels of heavy metals in blood and urine samples are reportable to the State Commissioner of Health: Metal

Sample

Reportable at or above

Lead

Blood
25 ug/dl

Cadmium

Blood
10 ng/ml

Urine
5 ug/l

Mercury

Blood
5 ng/ml

Urine
20 ng/ml

Arsenic

Urine
50 ug/l

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
22.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
